'''The Ring of Doom''' is a Text-Adventure in which the player takes over the place of the [[Ringbearer]] and has to destroy it in the fires of [[Mount Doom]].<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/ringofdoom.html Tolkien Games] (retrieved 27 October 2010)</ref> The author of this game is [[Sam Ruby]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref>[http://ifdb.tads.org/viewgame?id=39kismr830mc9ooy The Interactive Fiction Database] (retrieved 27 October 2010)</ref> It is the third part of the ''[[The Lord of the Rings (Eamon series)|The Lord of the Rings]]'' series.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
